name: Kraterka
description:
You play as Jaskry.  An ex military officer that choose to  live his life as  a journalist for Drabi Company. One day, they task you to investigate a suspicious building as reports pouring in that reported massive missing workers in that area. Find the truth!  Uncover the  secrets!

This is a demo game, not a finished product.

Controls:

  • [W,A,SD]  to move the character
  • F to turn on flashlight
  • E to interact
  • left click to shoot
  • right click to zoom
  • Left Shift to run
  • Spacebar to jump
  • Press 1,2,3 to change weapons

Made by Smickal

Main Menu Song:

https://soundcloud.com/dhsfx/sets/unnerving-ambient-sounds

All assets are free to use and used fairly.
